We need to stop using fossil fuels as much as we can- but don't think for a moment that we can stop pulling oil out of the ground. Plastics, which are everywhere in the world, are made from petroleum products, and I don't envision a world without plastic happening any time soon.

Yes, Zika was discovered in 1947 in Africa. There are NO birth defects there linked to Zika. It only started becoming linked with women in South America in the past TWO years. My point was that the powers that be have conveniently been leaving out when zika actually came on the scene in relation to when they """"linked"""" it to birth defects. It was over 70 years. There is big business in vaccines. There is big business in pesticides and genetically modified foods and insects, so no. I don't buy into most of what media, our government, or """"science"""" tries to push off on the general population.

Good point, Herlie. Also, why is anyone even giving credencce to anything Trump is saying regarding this? He separated himself from the pageant or they separated from him. He, supposedly, has nothing to do with it anymore. So, why doesn't he just shut up. Miss Colombia seems to think she actually won it and it was taken from her, officially. Someone needs to emphasize to her that she did not, in fact, win anything. It was an unfortunate mistake so why should there be any sharing. I guess some folks believe that a person who is mistakenly given a crown should be rewarded for it...why??? She didn't earn it by merit, it was a mistake.

The post office is my pet peeve. So bloated and unnecessary, they could easily be absorbed by fed ex and ups, we wouldn't even miss it and I hate the fact that I get to pay some guys pension and health care for delivering me junk mail that ends up in the trash
